game.minigame

Class Minigame<C,H,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.minigame.Minigame<C,H,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    C - The argument type passed in to the doTurn method.
    H - The return type of the getHeroLastTurn method.
    V - The return type of the getVillainLastTurn method.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DiceRolls, GuessTheNumber, PaperScissorsRock

    public abstract class Minigame<C,H,V>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A parent class of all the games.
    Author:
    jesse
